3: The abnormal signal should be coming from this area. The increase in bionics should indicate that we are approaching the core.

2: Stay alert. Keep an eye on the status of your M.I.N.D. at all times.

3: ...It's best not to think too much about things in the bionics' Virtual M.I.N.D.
Don't put any extra burden on the commandant. Clear the remaining Amberia data in this area ASAP to end the battle.
